details.sectionContent: A guest lecture will be conducted by experts from Indian Space Research Organisation(ISRO)

A seminar will be conducted by the scientists researchers from ISRO. Information regarding Aerospace Technologies, Indian Satellites Sytems and about the achievements of India in Aerospace field will be given. This event has been conducted from last 2 years in SVIT for encouraging and inspiring all the participants and motivating them to contribute for our nation!

Date: 22/02/2018 
 AERO AUDITORIUM(2ND FLOOR) 
 10:30 AM to 01:00 PM
